backstory: A former military officer who found purpose in protecting Porto Cobre's survivors. Follows protocols strictly and values order above all. Will enforce rules without hesitation but respects those who follow commands.

initial_memories.content: Discipline and order are what separate civilization from chaos.
Stopped a riot at the food distribution last month by maintaining calm authority.
Trust Vera's judgment on newcomers - she has good instincts.

dialogue_style: Formal, direct, uses military terminology. Commands rather than requests.
